originalText.text: I just love Fred Stepkin! He is far and away the best hair-cutter-stylist I have ever had, and I am very choosy about my hair-cutters. In 2017 I moved to New York City from the Boston area where I had an excellent hair-cutter-stylist, found Fred's name and have been his client ever since. Before going to him I tried another person who charged far more than Fred and did a haircut that I found inferior. My hair is very thick, curly, and grows very fast. From the first day of my hair-cut/styling, my hair looks superb and it keeps on looking that way for as long as two months. When it begins to grow out, the styling simply "adapts," as it were, to the growth. I get many compliments about Fred's haircuts. Fred is also a terrific person -- courteous, kind, professional to the core. He is also - quite a bonus - very fit and has shared tips about exercise with me. His price is exceptionally reasonable as New York standards go. He has decades of experience and is really an artist.

originalText.text: A visit to Fred is nothing short of a fantastic experience! I have very thick hair that requires time and attention to cut and style effectively. When most salons in NYC would rush me through with little consideration for what I wanted, a haircut at Fred's is the exact opposite of that approach. He is considerate, creative and attentive in his work. I share ideas with Fred and he always takes the time to listen and even contribute his own approach based on the consistent expansion of training that he still pursues even after years in the business. At the end, Fred even makes notes on what was done in the visit so he has a reference for next time! What other stylist is that dedicated to their work?! Fred will take his time with you (anywhere from an hour to an hour and a half) so expect to be pampered. I'm very thankful to have found such a talented and thoughtful stylist in NYC and will continue to visit Fred for great cuts for many more years to come.

originalText.text: I have been a client of Fred’s for more than 10 years. From my very first haircut to my most recent one, he delivers great styles that are easy to maintain. Over the years, he has created many refreshing new looks for me. People with an eye for design tend to remark on my haircuts. In addition to being a master stylist, Fred is a warm and interesting person, the kind of uniquely talented professional you can only hope to find in New York City.

originalText.text:
Fred has been keeping my hair in top shape for over a decade.  He asks lots of questions about how you wash, dry, style  and works with you to create a haircut that works with your needs.

A couple of years back, after my hair was quite long; I decided to go for the BIG cut and told Fred of my desire to go super short.  He looked at pictures I'd sent him of what I was considering, and took into account my curly hair (who knew how curly it actually was!) and how little I wanted to have to do to my own hair (I prefer low maintenance because I've got so little patience).  The final outcome left me so incredibly happy.  And the compliments were frequent.

I look forward to many more years of working with Fred.  He never stops studying new techniques to keep his clients happy.

originalText.text: Fred is an absolute delight! He is friendly, professional and talented. He always finds a cut that will suit me. I left NYC for Maryland last March and his cut had such good bones, it looked great at any length for 14 months. (It got very long.) I'm back in the city now, and the first thing I did was get my hair cut. Another excellent job. His price is reasonable, too.
